code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{DataContext}from'../contexts/DataContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Totals=function Totals(){var _useContext=useContext(DataContext),data=_useContext.data;var expenses=data.filter(function(e){return!e.isincome;});var incomes=data.filter(function(e){return e.isincome;});var totalExpense=0;var totalIncome=0;incomes.forEach(function(e){return totalIncome=parseInt(totalIncome)+parseInt(e.total);});expenses.forEach(function(e){return totalExpense=parseInt(totalExpense)+parseInt(e.total);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"totals-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{id:"income-head",children:"Total Income"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"total-income total",children:["$",totalIncome]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{id:"expense-head",children:"Total Expenses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"total-expenses total",children:["$",totalExpense]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Net"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"total-net total",children:["$",totalIncome-totalExpense]})]})]});};export default Totals;
